snippet: Ecolab said on Friday that it had agreed to acquire privately held Champion Technologies, an Texas energy specialty products and services company, and a related company, Corsicana Technologies, for $2.2 billion in cash and stock.
abstract: Ecolab said on Friday that it had agreed to acquire privately held Champion Technologies, an Texas energy specialty products and services company, and a related company, Corsicana Technologies, for $2.2 billion in cash and stock.
lead_paragraph: Ecolab said on Friday that it had agreed to acquire privately held Champion Technologies, an Texas energy specialty products and services company, and a related company, Corsicana Technologies, for $2.2 billion in cash and stock. Read more »

headline.main: $2.2 Billion Deal for Energy Services Company
